content: These forward-looking statements include, but are not limited to, the anticipated, features, benefits, scope, focus, status and goals of our platform, technology, products, studies, and partnerships with third parties, our ability to bring and the timing of bringing our products to market, our product development schedules, our strategies, our research and development plans, our customers, our commercial and market opportunities and trends, our debt obligations, our costs and expenses, our cash resources, cash burns, revenue guidance, financial projections and financial performance and our outlook and factors affecting the foregoing.
